doc:
Connie Francis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connie_Francis 0 Connie Francis (born Concetta Rosa Maria Franconero, December 12, 1937) is an American pop singer and top-charting female vocalist of the late 1950s and early 1960s. Although her chart success waned in the second half of the 1960s, Francis remained a top concert draw. Despite several severe interruptions in her career, she is still active as a recording and performing artist. Connie_Francis ( born Concetta_Rosa_Maria_Franconero , December_12_,_1937 ) is an_American_pop_singer and top-charting_female_vocalist of the_late_1950s and early_1960s . Although her_chart_success waned in the_second_half of the_1960s , Francis remained a_top_concert_draw . Despite several_severe_interruptions in her_career , she is still active as a_recording and performing artist .
